content.title: Let Users Pick ANY Color and Your WHOLE Website CHANGES!
content.description: Learn how to make colors on your website dynamic and let users pick any color they want. Really powerfull CSS stuff!

content.title: Spice Up Your Site with Quick & Easy Theme Transitions
content.description: Want to be creative with your website's theme transitions? This video will show you how to utilize ::view-transition sudo-element to create different theme transitions

content.title: Every React Concept Explained in 12 Minutes
content.description: Are you lost in React? This video will explain all the concepts of React in just 12 minutes. Perfect for beginners and those who want a quick refresher.

content.title: What's new in web UI
content.description: Are you ready to explore the latest trends in web interfaces? This is the right video to explore our future of web UI.

content.title: The Web Dev Hack NOBODY is Talking About
content.description: Have you ever mocked API responses in your local code? Here's a better way to do this with Chrome Dev Tool that you probably didn't know about.
